articles.title: EU Launch Sales for Battlefield 6 Beat Call of Duty: Black Ops 6’s EU Launch - Wccftech
articles.description: Launch sales for Battlefield 6 in the EU beat out the EU launch sales for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, GSD Data reports.
articles.content: There's no denying that Battlefield 6 has had a massive launch, one week into the game being on shelves. Even amidst issues for PC players and progression frustration, which EA and Battlefield Studio… [+3981 chars]
